EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-11-14 Know Before You Go AWS ReInvent.ES-20181105-Invite Send 2c.Subjec
EmailTemplate.subject: Top Tips for a Successful AWS re:Invent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Are you attending AWS re:Invent this year? If so, I'd like to personally invite you to next week's webinar on what you need to know before you go to the event.
Reserve Your Seat <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn]]>
During this live 30-minute live webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn]]>, you will find out what to expect at AWS re:Invent 2018, get a sneak peek into the must-see sessions, find out how to attend virtually and more. As an Amazon Partner Network (APN) company with AWS Migration Competency Status, Turbonomic helps organizations accelerate migrations to AWS, and continuously optimizes the environment to assure performance and lower cost while satisfying business constraints. I hope to see you there!
Best regards, Andrew
PS. If you can't join us live, sign up anyways <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn]]> to be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card and I'll send you the recording afterward.
